content: {"locationId": "4052", "organizationId": "3438", "name": "Westport Food Pantry", "address1": "931 Main Rd", "address2": "PO Box 3303", "city": "Westport", "state": "MA", "zipCode": "02790", "country": null, "phone": "774-930-8893", "phoneExt": null, "website": "https://www.westportfoodpantry.org/", "latitude": "41.57319", "longitude": "-71.09154", "foodPrograms": "Pantry", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "We distribute through a drive through distribution on Monday mornings.  Cars cue up in the driveway across the street in front of the Westport Quaker Meeting Friends House and then are directed through our line.
